item.title: qbotics and the Conquest of the -inner- Space: a Compensation System for Fresh Water Resources
item.description: A work on the use of water resources using innovative and very promising technologies in the field of geometry. An advance can be seen here: qbotics and the conquest of the -inner- space: a compensation system for fresh water resources.
